body:
Hello! Most of you don't know who I am, since I've never really played avicus. I'm an OCN player, and I play in the team Grim which has some avicus members. Now I joined "Grime" which is something like the Avicus' version of Grim. I'm going to merge into this community when OCN closes, and I'm going to be providing content for it, such as maps (I would say I'm an experienced map-maker), resource packs, and high quality memes.

So, ask me anything! :)
body_tagged:

replies.body:
I don't know why people tend to underrate you, your pvp is very good and you are a good player overall. Maybe sometimes you make mistakes, but everyone does. You are a very nice guy and I'm actually happy to know you, you are very kind and a great person to talk to.


When we were playing VH on Wallop and we didn't know if we had the proximity to win, time ran out and we actually won, that amazed me



ohh yessss

replies.body:
when I didn't know you only by chat I used to actually hate you, you were always toxic to everyone, and nobody used to like you. 
But now that I got to know you better I actually like you, you have changed a lot and I consider you one of my minecraft friends

About your pvp skills you are insane at melee, and I used to think you cheated, about your bow I don't really know. You are a very capable player for almost every position, but sometimes you tend to overrate yourself


I couldn't just choose one, every single player on grim has something that makes them special.


well I hope we get far, I see us maybe getting to semis or quarters, but I see really hard getting to the finals.


Galicia, in the north, up Portugal
